thread.title: Really Big Rooms for NYC
thread.title_full: Really Big Rooms for NYC - Review of The Tuscany - A St Giles Signature Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LaLaPhD
title: Really Big Rooms for NYC
text: I stayed for two short nights as part of a conference. I was in room 909, a wonderful "huge" corner room. After spending 3 nights in another hotel on the upper East side (shoe box side), this room was more than I could ask for! Really beautiful and spacious. The bathroom was modern and gorgeous. Staff was very friendly. I would stay here again 100%!
